data.name: Project Serotonin
data.detailed_description: A top-down 2D shooter where your health is happiness and the sad ones want to take it away from you.
data.about_the_game: A top-down 2D shooter where your health is happiness and the sad ones want to take it away from you.
data.short_description: A top-down 2D shooter where your health is happiness and the sad ones want to take it away from you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor made in the last 5 years
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor made in the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor made in the last 6 years
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor made in the last 6 years
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
